channel.title: Upr on Playful Explorations Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Upr on Playful Explorations Lab

item.title: UPR Story on 2018 App Camp
item.description: This week UPR broadcast a story about our 2018 App Camp. Jody and Megan are quoted throughout the segment. To read (or listen) the story, please follow this link: http://upr.org/post/summer-app-camp-teaches-girls-how-code
